```{r , include=FALSE}
if (exists("params")) {
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, eval = FALSE, comment = NA)
} else  {
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE, comment = NA)
}

survey <- read.delim( "data/survey.txt" )
```
